title.narrative: Increase Resilience of People Affected by Multiple Displacement in North and South Kivu

description.narrative: Increase Resilience of People Affected by Multiple Displacement in North and South Kivu

This project is implemented by a Consortium made up of Norwegian Refugee Council, International Alert, and Climate Interactive. The project seeks to improve the situation of people affected by multiple displacement in Eastern DRC by increasing their resilience.

participating-org.narrative: United States Agency for International Development
